Previous: rājNext: rās

√rādh 'succeed'

present: [5.] rādhnoti etc. B.+   -- [4.] rā́dhyate etc. AV.+  rā́dhyati etc. S.+  

perfect: rarā́dha etc.  

aorist: [1.] arādham  rādhati  rādhat etc.  rādhās  rādhyāsam  rādhyāsma  árādhi   -- [3.] arīradhat etc.   -- [4.] arātsīt etc.   -- [5.] rādhiṣi etc.  

future: [1.] rātsyati etc.   -- [2.] rāddhā  

verbal: rāddhá AV.+  rāddhvā́  -rādhya  

secondary: passive: rādhyate   -- intensive: rārādh-   -- desiderative: rirātsa-  ritsa-   -- causative: rādhayati etc. AV.+  rādhyate  rirādhayiṣati  

derivatives: rā́dha V.+  -rādhin E.  rā́dhya V.+  rā́dhana AV.+  -rādhanīya C.  rā́dhas V.+  -rādhi AV.  rā́ddhi AV.B.S.  -rāddhṛ C.  -rādhayitṛ C.  -rādhayiṣṇu E.  

The form iradhanta RV1., with the infin. irádhyai (for iradhádhyai) RV1., appears to belong to this root.
